appetizers.name: Carrot Corn Soup
appetizers.description: Carrots, corn, onions and light spices.

appetizers.name: Gobi Manchurian
appetizers.description: Battered bite size cauliflower pieces cooked in a sweet and sour sauce topped with scallions.

appetizers.name: Sesame Chicken Naan
appetizers.description: Naan Bread stuffed with lightly spiced chicken and topped with Sesame seeds.

entrees.name: Punjabi Kadi Pakora
entrees.description: A traditional curry made from chic-pea flour , yogurt and spices, with pakoras (dumplings made from fresh vegetable.

entrees.name: Garlic Chicken
entrees.description: Boneless pieces of malai tikka cooked with a touch of fresh garlic and spices. Served on a sizzler.

entrees.name: Lamb Turnip
entrees.description: Lamb cubes cooked with fresh turnip and a blend of spices in a light sauce.

entrees.name: Tamarind Fish Curry
entrees.description: Tilapia fillets, mustard seeds, curry leaves, touch of tamarind, in a curry sauce.
